body: @JeffesJiang If your problem has been solved and this is not a bug, please consider closing the issue. Thanks.
https://echarts.apache.org/en/api.html#events.datazoom
We are considering providing *pipes* like `formatter: "{b}\n{c | fixed(2)}"` and provide some utility functions. But we haven't reached solid conclusions.
That seems like https://vuejs.org/v2/guide/filters.html, which provides the possiblity to define filters that can be used to apply common text formatting. I appreciate it very much!
@Ovilia thanks. Sorry for the type. I did mean 11:30 to 13:00. I think my request is same as #12790
This issue has been automatically marked as stale because it has not had recent activity. It will be closed if no further activity occurs. Thank you for your contributions.

Hi! We've received your issue and please be patient to get responded. üéâ
The average response time is expected to be within one day for weekdays.

In the meanwhile, please make sure that **you have posted enough image to demo your request**. You may also check out the [API](http://echarts.apache.org/api.html) and [chart option](http://echarts.apache.org/option.html) to get the answer.

If you don't get helped for a long time (over a week) or have an urgent question to ask, you may also send an email to dev@echarts.apache.org. Please attach the issue link if it's a technical questions.

If you are interested in the project, you may also subscribe our [mail list](https://echarts.apache.org/en/maillist.html).

Have a nice day! üçµ

Hi, I think you may use [`series-line.stack`](https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#series-line.stack) and [`series-line.areaStyle`](https://echarts.apache.org/en/option.html#series-line.areaStyle) to achieve such a chart.
Here is a demo on ECharts Gallery: https://gallery.echartsjs.com/editor.html?c=xuhc-jNNJ0&v=1

@Ovilia why the `waiting-for:author` tag: do you need some more info?

After further testing, it does look related to `tooltip`, after hiding the tooltip, it's very responsive. However, tooltips are important, so I also tested adding `showDelay : 25`, having just a very small delay on the tooltip has given almost perfect responsiveness in the graph.

Thanks, you saved my day.

We are going to make a new feature that the last data label will be displayed. Does this feature works for you? What else do you need?

In test is just simple navigation to the web-page and than the protractor action for getting text from the element in page (like this is in above example I provided).
So breaking line in [test](https://github.com/jst10/echarts-e2e-example/blob/master/e2e/src/app.e2e-spec.ts)  is [14](https://github.com/jst10/echarts-e2e-example/blob/master/e2e/src/app.e2e-spec.ts#L14), at this point protractor hangs. In case that I do not use echarts on my web [page](https://github.com/jst10/echarts-e2e-example/blob/master/src/app/app.component.ts) removing lines[ 34 and 35](https://github.com/jst10/echarts-e2e-example/blob/master/src/app/app.component.ts#L34), E2E  test executes as it should.
